title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Extras DVDrip AVC AC3 VOL36
description:
Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Extras DVDrip AVC AC3 VOL36

UPDATED WITH SHOUT-VOL02, SHOUT-VOL35, AND SHOUT-VOL36 EXTRAS - OVER 3 HOURS ADDED

The DVD Extras share includes all non-movie items from Rhino and Shout Single and Volume DVD releases including:

* a total of 350 videos with a running time of 42hours 43minutes 49seconds (MKV-AVC/AC3 format)

* 102 DVD menus:
** all Shout menus plus the Rhino menu from 202.TheSidehackers that has a Menu video of Joel singing Love Pads The Film

* 69 movie trailers

* 16 MST Hour Wraps with Jack Perkins

* all 3 MST3K Video JukeBoxes << now with UPDATED chapters and MP3 versions

* many interviews, documentaries, outtakes, convention panels, and more

* 110 still images (PNG format)

* 3 audio extras (MP3 format)

* 617 The Sword And The Dragon Vol24 has 2 shorts:
1) A Date With Your Family From 602 Invasion USA
2) Snow Thrills From 311 It Conquered The World

* Only 4 videos have chapters and all 4 are custom with names:
1) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol1 from 810 The Giant Spider Invasion Vol10 << UPDATED chapters
2) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol2 from 206 Ring Of Terror Vol11 << UPDATED chapters
3) MST3K Video JukeBox Vol3 from 612 The Starfighters Vol12 << UPDATED chapters
4) Vintage MST3K Promos from 611 Last Of The Wild Horses Vol23

* The files are sorted in folders by Volume/Singles and Company but the file naming is the same as the full MST movie MKV-AVC/AC3 encodes. So these extra files could be put in one directory with all the MST movies and all the files would be ordered by release number.

* All Shout Volume re-issues and from Volume35+ the extra names now include Shout. The other extra names will stay as is.

Video: AVC encode
Width 720, Anamorphic Loose, Copping Manual 0 0 0 0
Deinterlace=Slower -or- Decomb=Default
FPS 29.97 Constant, Preset=Very Slow, Quality RF=20.0
Audio: AC3 Passthru 192Kbps

If these encodes were enjoyable, you don't have the original discs and you can afford them, please consider picking up some the official MST3K DVDs. The artwork, packaging, menus and extras with the DVDs are fantastic.

Please check out other MST3K, Rifftrax, Battlestar Galactica, DC Comics, documentaries, Star Trek Enterprise and more at:

and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
